DeliveryPage.fastDeliveryBannerTitle: With Fast Delivery, receive your encrypted phone in the shortest time possible
DeliveryPage.deliveryPointsDescription: Use the interactive map to find our selected pickup points closest to your location
DeliveryPage.howDoesFastDeliveryTitle: How does Fast Delivery of Encrypted work?

deliveyPoint.title: Select a delivery point
deliveyPoint.description: Check the nearest location where you would like to pick up your encrypted phone

contactUsOnTelegram.title: Contact us on Telegram
contactUsOnTelegram.description: Contact us through our Telegram channel and coordinate the purchase of your encrypted phone

pickUpYourPhone.title: Pick up your encrypted phone
pickUpYourPhone.description: Once the delivery is coordinated, pick up your encrypted phone and enjoy secure communications

DeliveryPage.downloadApp: Download the App for iOS & Android and buy your SIM now
DeliveryPage.scanQR: Or scan the QR code with your camera

immediateDelivery.title: What is Fast Delivery of Encrypted Devices?
immediateDelivery.content: Delivery of Encrypted Devices is a specialized service that allows you to enjoy your encrypted SIM or device in less than 48 hours.

whereDelivery.title: What products can I buy with Fast Delivery?
whereDelivery.content: You can obtain any of the selected encrypted cell phone brands on our website.

costDelivery.title: What is the cost of Fast Delivery of Encrypted Devices?
costDelivery.content: The cost of Fast Delivery of Encrypted Devices varies according to your location; you just need to message us on Telegram, and we will assist you with the prices and arrangements so you can get your product as soon as possible.

EncryptedSimPage.totalSecurityTitle: with complete security in your communications
EncryptedSimPage.addYourSimSubtitle: Get your SIM/eSIM with mobile data and enjoy total anonymity in calls, filters, IMSI changes, and more
EncryptedSimPage.coverageDescription: Check the cost of a gigabyte by country and the recommended profile, so you can optimize your data usage at the best price
EncryptedSimPage.encryptedTitle: The Encrypted SIM provides you with the highest security and anonymity anywhere in the world
EncryptedSimPage.encryptedDescription: Security and privacy in your communications, make anonymous and untraceable calls, and protect yourself against IMSI Catchers

commonFeatures.appAvailable: App available on iOS and Android

data.title: Buy your mobile data plan and communicate with total privacy

minutes.title: Buy MINUTES for anonymous and untraceable calls

imsi.title: Buy IMSI changes equivalent to replacing your SIM with a new one

esim.title: Purchase your eSIM and enhance your security instantly

sim.title: Buy your SIM card and receive it anywhere in the world
featuresCardSim: Receive it anywhere in the world

improveYourSecurity.titleImproveYourSecurity: Enhance your security with these features

untraceable.title: Untraceable
untraceable.description: Communicate from anywhere while being completely anonymous and untraceable

anonymity.title: Anonymity
anonymity.description: Billing and shipping information is not linked to the chip, so it is completely anonymous

changeMSI.title: IMSI Change
changeMSI.description: The IMSI change replaces the identity of your SIM with a new one. It is equivalent to changing the SIM for a new one

subtituteNumber.title: Substitute Number
subtituteNumber.description: Generate a random number for each call that will appear on the recipient's caller ID

voiceFilter.title: Voice filters
voiceFilter.description: Use 7 different voice filters for greater anonymity in your calls

callback.title: Callback
callback.description: Generate a random number for each call that will appear in the recipient's identifier

plans.title: Plans without a cut-off date
plans.description: No contracts or cut-off dates. Enjoy the flexibility of plans without expiration dates and complete control over your data

geolocalization.title: Encrypted geolocation
geolocalization.description: Protect your location at all times with advanced encryption that ensures you cannot be tracked or located

globalCoverage.title: Global coverage
globalCoverage.description: Connect from anywhere in the world with total coverage and without compromising your security

maskMSI.title: Mask the IMSI
maskMSI.description: Hide your IMSI to avoid interception or fake antennas like IMSI Catchers

providerPrivateRed.title: Private network provider
providerPrivateRed.description: We are a private MVNO with complete discretion in the use of your personal data

withOutNumber.title: Without a phone number
withOutNumber.description: For greater security and anonymity, this SIM does not have a phone number

EncryptedSimPage.ourObjetiveTitle: Our goal is to provide you with total protection
EncryptedSimPage.ourObjetiveDescription: Having the International Encrypted SIM card means having a private network provider that will ensure your security while preventing your information from being manipulated, shared, or sold
EncryptedSimPage.comunicationTitle: Communicate from anywhere in the world with the peace of mind of being safe and anonymous
EncryptedSimPage.secureAndEasyToUseDescription: It activates instantly online and guarantees total privacy and protection for your data. You can easily recharge it from wherever you are
EncryptedSimPage.payOnlyForWhatYouUseTitle: Pay only for what you use
EncryptedSimPage.payOnlyForWhatYouUseDescription: As long as you are using the Encrypted SIM Card, your balance never expires, regardless of how long it takes you to use it
EncryptedSimPage.payOnlySecondCard: Your plan has no cut-off date

whyCallWithEncryptedSIM.title: Why call with the Encrypted SIM?
whyCallWithEncryptedSIM.card1: We do not store call history
whyCallWithEncryptedSIM.card2: Anonymity in calls through tools: ID substitution, Callback, and Voice Filter
whyCallWithEncryptedSIM.card3: The SIM generates a random substitute number for each call for increased anonymity

EncryptedSimPage.downloadAppTitle: Download the app for iOS & Android
EncryptedSimPage.downloadAppDescription: Download the app for iOS & Android

MayaData.monthPackage: with monthly plans and unlimited data
MayaData.whereUseSim: Where will you use your SIM?
MayaData.connectInternet: Connect to the Internet with your SIM in over 200 countries. Enjoy secure internet with complete privacy

allBenefits.title: All these benefits for you
allBenefits.connectionDescription: Connect to high-speed mobile networks like 5G and LTE, ensuring a fast and efficient connection
allBenefits.avoidHighRoamingDescription: Avoid high spending on roaming services and keep track of your data
allBenefits.connectInstanlyDescription: Choose your region, select the plan that best fits your needs, and connect instantly
allBenefits.globalReachDescription: Communicate effortlessly and anonymously in over 200 countries with easy connectivity and affordability
allBenefits.totalAnonymityDescription: Communicate with total anonymity from 200 countries around the world
allBenefits.unlimitedDataDescription: Find unlimited plans so that gigabytes are not a problem. Stay connected

howItWorks.title: Here's how it works
howItWorks.chooseRegionTitle: Choose the region where you want to use your
howItWorks.chooseRegionDescription: Choose one of our destinations or regions where you can use our eSIM
howItWorks.choosePlanDescription: Choose the plan that best fits your needs; we have plans for one month, three months, or six months
howItWorks.activateSimTitle: Activate your eSIM and enjoy your
howItWorks.activateSimDescription: Activate your eSIM easily and quickly, and start enjoying global communications with anonymity

BneSimPage.headline: Connect anywhere
BneSimPage.subheadline: Your data won’t expire, no matter how long
BneSimPage.anonDescription: Data that is not stored cannot be leaked or revealed. It’s part of our philosophy not to collect personal information or logs of our customers.

OurSimCard.title: No roaming charges
OurSimCard.description: Our SIM lets you connect to a local operator and avoid high roaming fees
OurSimCard.title2: Connect with just a few clicks
OurSimCard.description2: Activate your SIM easily, and your data will be ready to use in more than 200 countries
OurSimCard.description3: Choose from various data plans based on your needs and take as long as you want to use your resources
OurSimCard.description4: Get your SIM from anywhere in the world and activate it instantly with ease and total anonymity

PromoBanner.title: No cutoff dates or expiring plans!
PromoBanner.description: Take as long as you want to use your SIM or eSIM resources. There are no cutoff dates or data expiration.

BannerAnonymous.title: Your purchase is anonymous
BannerAnonymous.description: Enjoy complete anonymity when purchasing your SIM or eSIM, we do not store any trace or personal information

OurBneCard.title: Choose a data plan for your SIM or eSIM
OurBneCard.description: Select your region and choose the plan that best fits your needs and budget
OurBneCard.title2: Buy it, load it, and connect from anywhere
OurBneCard.description2: Purchase your SIM, load your plan, and activate anonymous communications from anywhere in the world
OurBneCard.title3: Enjoy your data plan with no cutoff dates
OurBneCard.description3: Your plan will activate instantly. Take as long as you want to use it.

whatIsBne.title: What is BNE SIM?
whatIsBne.content: BNE SIM is an international SIM card that allows you to connect to the internet in over 200 countries with complete anonymity and no cutoff dates

howToActivate.title: How do I activate my BNE SIM?
howToActivate.content: Activate your SIM easily and quickly. Just insert it into your device and follow the activation instructions

howToBuy.title: How do I buy a BNE SIM?
howToBuy.content: Buy your SIM on our website, select your data plan, and have it delivered to your home or anywhere in the world

QRBanner.title: Download the App for iOS & Android and buy your SIM now
QRBanner.description: Or scan the QR code with your camera
